channel.title: operating systems on Foosn PTE Ltd
channel.description: Recent content in operating systems on Foosn PTE Ltd

item.title: Xous: MMU-enforced Microkernel Operating System
item.description: Xous is a microkernel operating system designed for medium embedded systems with clear separation of processes. Nearly everything is implemented in userspace, where message passing forms the basic communications primitive. Find out more at xous.dev, or join the project on Github.
